title: Render of Scrumptious Flesh
content:
y with this weapon type unlocks:

It might be your imagination, but when blood runs over the blade, you could swear you hear... slurping.

Longsword Versatile

Render of Scrumptious Flesh is one of the Longsword Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Render of Scrumptious Flesh is an enchanted longsword that deals additional Necrotic damage and can stop an enemy from healing. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.). Characters need
